title: Ep. 1057 - Dem's Genius Plan to Fight Inflation With More Inflation
description:
The Democrats’ “Inflation Reduction Act” will exacerbate inflation, according to a new study; the very vaccinated Joe Biden tests positive for COVID twice in two weeks; and San Francisco refuses to let monkeypox stop its citywide gay leather festivities.
